verses.verse: כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- When תֵצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> te-Tze When thou goest out לַמִּלְחָמָ֜ה <S%H4421><s%> lam-mil-cha-Mah to battle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against אֹיְבֶ֗יךָ <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vei-cha, against thine enemies וְֽרָאִ֜יתָ <S%H7200><s%> ve-ra-'I-ta and seest ס֤וּס <S%H5483><s%> sus horses וָרֶ֙כֶב֙ <S%H7393><s%> va-Re-chev and chariots עַ֚ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am [and] a people רַ֣ב <S%H7227><s%> rav more מִמְּךָ֔ <S%H4480><s%> mi-me-Cha, than לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo do תִירָ֖א <S%H3372><s%> ti-Ra than thou be not afraid מֵהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem; like כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- When יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of them for the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach, with הַמַּֽעַלְךָ֖ <S%H5927><s%> ham-ma-'al-Cha [is] with thee which brought thee up מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וְהָיָ֕ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become כְּקָֽרָבְכֶ֖ם <S%H7126><s%> ke-ka-ra-ve-Chem And it shall be when ye are come nigh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> ham-mil-cha-Mah; unto the battle וְנִגַּ֥שׁ <S%H5066><s%> ve-nig-Gash shall approach הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen that the priest וְדִבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> ve-dib-Ber and speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am. unto the people

וְאָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-Mar And shall say אֲלֵהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem to שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> she-Ma' unto them Hear יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, O Israel אַתֶּ֨ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem ye קְרֵבִ֥ים <S%H7131><s%> ke-re-Vim ye approach הַיּ֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom this day לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> lam-mil-cha-Mah unto battle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against אֹיְבֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-vei-Chem; against your enemies אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay יֵרַ֣ךְ <S%H7401><s%> ye-Rach faint לְבַבְכֶ֗ם <S%H3824><s%> le-vav-Chem, let not your hearts אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּֽירְא֧וּ <S%H3372><s%> ti-re-'U fear וְאַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- not תַּחְפְּז֛וּ <S%H2648><s%> tach-pe-Zu not and do not tremble וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- not תַּֽעַרְצ֖וּ <S%H6206><s%> ta-'ar-Tzu neither be ye terrified מִפְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-nei-Hem. because

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh For the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem, your God הַהֹלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-ho-Lech [is] he that goeth עִמָּכֶ֑ם <S%H5973><s%> 'im-ma-Chem; against לְהִלָּחֵ֥ם <S%H3898><s%> le-hil-la-Chem with you to fight לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- against אֹיְבֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-vei-Chem for you against your enemies לְהוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <S%H3467><s%> le-ho-Shi-a' to save אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem.

וְדִבְּר֣וּ <S%H1696><s%> ve-dib-be-Ru shall speak הַשֹּֽׁטְרִים֮ <S%H7860><s%> hash-sho-te-Rim And the officers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am unto the people לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- Who הָאִ֞ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish What man אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that בָּנָ֤ה <S%H1129><s%> ba-Nah [is there] that hath built בַֽיִת־ <S%H1004><s%> va-yit- house חָדָשׁ֙ <S%H2319><s%> cha-Dash a new וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not חֲנָכ֔וֹ <S%H2596><s%> cha-na-Cho, and hath not dedicated יֵלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ye-Lech depart וְיָשֹׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> ve-ya-Sho and return לְבֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> le-vei-To; to his house פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- otherwise יָמוּת֙ <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut lest he die בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> bam-mil-cha-Mah, in the battle וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish man אַחֵ֖ר <S%H312><s%> 'a-Cher and another יַחְנְכֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H2596><s%> yach-ne-Chen-nu. dedicate

וּמִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> u-mi- Who הָאִ֞ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish And what man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- that נָטַ֥ע <S%H5193><s%> na-Ta' [is he] that hath planted כֶּ֙רֶם֙ <S%H3754><s%> ke-rem a vineyard וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not חִלְּל֔וֹ <S%H2490><s%> chil-le-Lo, and hath not [yet] eaten יֵלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ye-Lech along וְיָשֹׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> ve-ya-Sho and return לְבֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> le-vei-To; unto his house פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- otherwise יָמוּת֙ <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut lest he die בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> bam-mil-cha-Mah, in the battle וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish man אַחֵ֖ר <S%H312><s%> 'a-Cher and another יְחַלְּלֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H2490><s%> ye-chal-le-Len-nu. eat

וּמִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> u-mi- and who הָאִ֞ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish And what man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- is אֵרַ֤שׂ <S%H781><s%> 'e-Ras [is there] that hath betrothed אִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah a wife וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not לְקָחָ֔הּ <S%H3947><s%> le-ka-Chah, and hath not taken יֵלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ye-Lech depart וְיָשֹׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> ve-ya-Sho and return לְבֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> le-vei-To; unto his house פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- otherwise יָמוּת֙ <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut lest he die בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> bam-mil-cha-Mah, in the battle וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish man אַחֵ֖ר <S%H312><s%> 'a-Cher and another יִקָּחֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H3947><s%> yik-ka-Chen-nah. take

וְיָסְפ֣וּ <S%H3254><s%> ve-ya-se-Fu further הַשֹּׁטְרִים֮ <S%H7860><s%> hash-sho-te-Rim And the officers לְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> le-dab-Ber shall speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָעָם֒ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am unto the people וְאָמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-me-Ru, and they shall say מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- Who הָאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish What man הַיָּרֵא֙ <S%H3373><s%> hai-ya-Re [is there that is] fearful וְרַ֣ךְ <S%H7390><s%> ve-Rach faint הַלֵּבָ֔ב <S%H3824><s%> hal-le-Vav, heart יֵלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ye-Lech along וְיָשֹׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> ve-ya-Sho and return לְבֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> le-vei-To; unto his house וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not יִמַּ֛ס <S%H4549><s%> yim-Mas faint אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- לְבַ֥ב <S%H3824><s%> le-Vav as well as his heart אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav lest his brethren's כִּלְבָבֽוֹ׃ <S%H3824><s%> kil-va-Vo. hearts

וְהָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become כְּכַלֹּ֥ת <S%H3615><s%> ke-chal-Lot have made an end הַשֹּׁטְרִ֖ים <S%H7860><s%> hash-sho-te-Rim And it shall be when the officers לְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> le-dab-Ber of speaking אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am; unto the people וּפָ֥קְד֛וּ <S%H6485><s%> u-Fa-ke-Du that they shall make שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei captains צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of the armies בְּרֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> be-Rosh to lead הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am. the people ס sa-Mek

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- When תִקְרַ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> tik-Rav When thou comest nigh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about עִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> 'Ir, unto a city לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <S%H3898><s%> le-hil-la-Chem to fight עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha; against וְקָרָ֥אתָ <S%H7121><s%> ve-ka-Ra-ta against it then proclaim אֵלֶ֖יהָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-ha of לְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> le-sha-Lom. peace

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah shall become אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If שָׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom of peace תַּֽעַנְךָ֔ <S%H6030><s%> ta-'an-Cha, And it shall be if it make thee answer וּפָתְחָ֖ה <S%H6605><s%> u-fa-te-Chah and open לָ֑ךְ Lach; וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah shall become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am unto thee then it shall be [that] all the people הַנִּמְצָא־ <S%H4672><s%> han-nim-tza- [that is] found בָ֗הּ Vah, יִהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu shall become לְךָ֛ le-Cha לָמַ֖ס <S%H4522><s%> la-Mas therein shall be tributaries וַעֲבָדֽוּךָ׃ <S%H5647><s%> va-'a-va-Du-cha. unto thee and they shall serve

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo does not תַשְׁלִים֙ <S%H7999><s%> tash-Lim And if it will make no peace עִמָּ֔ךְ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mach, against וְעָשְׂתָ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-se-Tah with thee but will make עִמְּךָ֖ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-me-Cha against מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> mil-cha-Mah; war וְצַרְתָּ֖ <S%H6696><s%> ve-tzar-Ta against thee then thou shalt besiege עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha. and

וּנְתָנָ֛הּ <S%H5414><s%> u-ne-ta-Nah hath delivered יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And when the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-De-cha; it into thine hands וְהִכִּיתָ֥ <S%H5221><s%> ve-hik-ki-Ta thou shalt smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all זְכוּרָ֖הּ <S%H2138><s%> ze-chu-Rah every male לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> le-fi- thereof with the edge חָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> Cha-rev. of the sword

רַ֣ק <S%H7535><s%> rak but הַ֠נָּשִׁים <S%H802><s%> Han-na-shim But the women וְהַטַּ֨ף <S%H2945><s%> ve-hat-Taf and the little ones וְהַבְּהֵמָ֜ה <S%H929><s%> ve-hab-be-he-Mah and the cattle וְכֹל֩ <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol and all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh is in בָעִ֛יר <S%H5892><s%> va-'Ir and all that is in the city כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all שְׁלָלָ֖הּ <S%H7998><s%> she-la-Lah [even] all the spoil תָּבֹ֣ז <S%H962><s%> ta-Voz thereof shalt thou take לָ֑ךְ Lach; וְאָֽכַלְתָּ֙ <S%H398><s%> ve-'a-chal-Ta unto thyself and thou shalt eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁלַ֣ל <S%H7998><s%> she-Lal the spoil אֹיְבֶ֔יךָ <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vei-cha, of thine enemies אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan hath given יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> ken Thus תַּעֲשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh Thus shalt thou do לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol to all הֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim, unto all the cities הָרְחֹקֹ֥ת <S%H7350><s%> ha-re-cho-Kot far off מִמְּךָ֖ <S%H4480><s%> mi-me-Cha that מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; [which are] very אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- are not מֵעָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> me-'a-Rei [are] not of the cities הַגּֽוֹיִם־ <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-yim- of these nations הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh of these הֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2007><s%> Hen-nah. from thee which

רַ֗ק <S%H7535><s%> Rak, in מֵעָרֵ֤י <S%H5892><s%> me-'a-Rei But of the cities הָֽעַמִּים֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'am-Mim of these people הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, of these אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten doth give לְךָ֖ le-Cha נַחֲלָ֑ה <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lah; thee [for] an inheritance לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תְחַיֶּ֖ה <S%H2421><s%> te-chai-Yeh thou shalt save alive כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- anything נְשָׁמָֽה׃ <S%H5397><s%> ne-sha-Mah. nothing that breatheth
